kalix.scalasdk.eventsourcedentity

EventSourcedEntityOptions

Companion object EventSourcedEntityOptions

trait EventSourcedEntityOptions extends EntityOptions

Root entity options for all event sourcing entities.

Abstract Value Members

  1.  abstract def forwardHeaders: Set[String]

    returns

    the headers requested to be forwarded as metadata (cannot be mutated, use withForwardHeaders)

    Definition Classes
    EntityOptions → ComponentOptions
  2.  abstract def passivationStrategy: PassivationStrategy

    returns

    the passivation strategy for an entity

    Definition Classes

  3.  abstract def snapshotEvery: Int
  4.  abstract def withForwardHeaders(headers: Set[String]): EventSourcedEntityOptions

    Ask Kalix to forward these headers from the incoming request as metadata headers for the incoming commands.

    Ask Kalix to forward these headers from the incoming request as metadata headers for the incoming commands. By default no headers except "X-Server-Timing" are forwarded.

    Definition Classes
    EventSourcedEntityOptions → EntityOptions → ComponentOptions
  5.  abstract def withSnapshotEvery(numberOfEvents: Int): EventSourcedEntityOptions

    Specifies how snapshots of the entity state should be made: Zero means use default from configuration file.

    Specifies how snapshots of the entity state should be made: Zero means use default from configuration file. Any negative value means never snapshot. Any positive value means snapshot at-or-after that number of events.

    It is strongly recommended to not disable snapshotting unless it is known that event sourced entity will never have more than 100 events (in which case the default will anyway not trigger any snapshots)

  6.  abstract def withPassivationStrategy(strategy: PassivationStrategy): EventSourcedEntityOptions

    Create an entity option with the given passivation strategy.

    Create an entity option with the given passivation strategy.

    strategy

    to be used

    returns

    the entity option

    Definition Classes
    EventSourcedEntityOptions → EntityOptions
    Annotations
    @deprecated
    Deprecated

    (Since version 1.1.4) passivation strategy is ignored

  2.  def formatted(fmtstr: String): String
    Implicit

    Definition Classes

    Annotations
    @deprecated @inline()
    Deprecated

    (Since version 2.12.16) Use formatString.format(value) instead of value.formatted(formatString), or use the f"" string interpolator. In Java 15 and later, formatted resolves to the new method in String which has reversed parameters.
